visual_tags: Body: Constantly shifting grey noise/static texture
Face: A smooth white porcelain mask with a vertical crack
Aura: Emits jagged red lightning bolts when aggressive
Sound: Accompanied by a low, bass-heavy hum in the panel text

description.physical: A humanoid figure made of vibrating television static and white porcelain armor plates.
description.personality: Territorial, silent, lethal. It does not speak, it emits frequencies that cause nausea.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card
